name: Amaterasu
description:
/!\ Aprilfool patch : fixed the victory screen not showing (CapsLock issue when retyped the "victory signal" name :-/) ==> Dev time + 3 min /!\

I teamed up with Mirkay for the graphics - it's her first Jam :-)

Dev : 4.5h

Gfx : 3h

the sound is glitchy when played in a brother, sorry folks
